data.eml:eml: Provisional revision of American snapping shrimp allied to Alpheus floridanus Kingsley, 1878 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Alpheidae) with notes on A. floridanus africanus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bracken-Grissom, Heather D., Felder, Darryl L. (2014): Provisional revision of American snapping shrimp allied to Alpheus floridanus Kingsley, 1878 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Alpheidae) with notes on A. floridanus africanus. Zootaxa 3895 (4): 451-491, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3895.4.1
